name: Default GSM Character Set
description: This regular expression finds any characters which are not part of the default GSM character set
content:
This regular expression covers the Default GSM Character Set
https://www.csoft.co.uk/sms/character_sets/gsm.htm
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/GSM_03.38#GSM_7-bit_default_alphabet_and_extension_table_of_3GPP_TS_23.038_.2F_GSM_03.38

@ Δ  0 ¡ P ¿ p
£ _ ! 1 A Q a q
$ Φ " 2 B R b r
¥ Γ # 3 C S c s
è Λ ¤ 4 D T d t
é Ω % 5 E U e u
ù Π & 6 F V f v
ì Ψ ' 7 G W g w
ò Σ ( 8 H X h x
Ç Θ ) 9 I Y i y
LF Ξ * : J Z j z
Ø  + ; K Ä k ä
ø Æ , < L Ö l ö
æ - = M Ñ m ñ
Å ß . > N Ü n ü
å É / ? O § o à
|^€{}[~]\

Some characters which do not fall into the default set:
